title: I'd Buy These 17 Amazon Beauty Items Even If They Weren't On Sale (But They Are)
text: Black Friday and Cyber Monday are right around the corner, and the holidays are following close behind. That's right, folks—we're sitting squarely in peak shopping season. While there are so many good beauty sales to shop, I don't like getting lost in the hype, buying items I don't need, and spending money I shouldn't have...just because everything is discounted. After all, there's nothing worse than taking a chance on a sale product only to discover that you've wasted your time and money on a subpar product.That's why, this year, I'm focusing my efforts on purchasing tried-and-true beauty products. I'm talking about the ones that are so good, I buy them all year long at full price. In other words, I'm not buying them because they're on sale, but because I really, truly, honestly love them...and they just so happen to be on sale. Catch my drift? Ahead, see the 19 me-approved, currently-on-sale Amazon beauty items I'm buying for Black Friday. COSRX Snail Mucin 96% Power Face Serum Currently 48% off the original full price ICYMI, snail mucin is a stellar K-beauty ingredient. It contains high amounts of hyaluronic acid and has anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties. That explains why it's so good at giving me plump, dewy, "glass skin." This TikTok-famous product doesn't disappoint. With 96% snail mucin, it's chock full of the skin-transforming ingredient. I'm restocking while it's on sale, because I use this all the time, especially in the colder months to soothe, and hydrate my skin. Shark Flexstyle Air Styling & Drying System Currently 23% off the original full price I've seen the Shark Flexstyle Air Styling & Drying System all over Instagram and TikTok, and for good reason. It dries and styles the hair without excessive heat and subsequent damage. Plus, thanks to powerful airflow, it delivers the big, bouncy blowouts of my dreams. While I already have one, I'm planning on snagging a couple of them while they're on sale to gift to family and friends. BIODANCE Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask Currently 32% off the original full price Another TikTok-viral product, this overnight hydrogel mask gives me the glowiest, glassiest skin I've ever had. It's all thanks to oligo-hyaluronic acid, ultra-low molecular collagen, galactomyces ferment filtrate, and niacinamide. These ingredients penetrate the skin overnight to moisturize, plump, refine, smooth, and blur the skin. Try it, just once, and tell me you're not in love! Lancôme Lash Idôle Lash-Lifting & Volumizing Mascara SolaWave 4-In-1 Radiant Renewal Facial Wand Currently 40% off the original full price This travel-friendly skin device uses four technologies—red light, galvanic current, facial massage, and therapeutic warmth—to target everything from fine lines and wrinkles to dark spots and blemishes. It even comes with the brand's Activating Serum which enhances the results of the device and provides a smooth, cushiony glide. Youth To The People Kale and Green Tea Cleanser Currently 20% off the original full price I've been using this cleanser on and off for years. It dissolves dirt, oil, makeup, and sunscreen like a charm. It also smells nice, foams into a silky lather, and delivers superfoods straight to my skin (kale, green tea, and spinach). It's like green juice for the face. Nuxe Huile Prodigieuse Multi-Purpose Dry Oil Currently 33% off the original full price This classic French pharmacy product is so good. The multi-purpose dry oil is never heavy or greasy, and it can be used on the face, body, and hair for extra moisture and nourishment. Plus, it smells incredible. When I wear it, I go without perfume—that's how good it is. While I usually wait to pick this up until I'm in Paris, I have to snag a couple of bottles while it's on sale. Currently 45% off the original full price An ice roller is a quick, easy, and affordable way to reduce puffiness and inflammation in the mornings. Plus, if you're a night owl like me, it helps wake you up and feel refreshed, even before your first cup of coffee. I highly recommend trying one if you haven't already. Currently 20% off the original full price I know so many die-hard fans of this moisturizer, and I think I'm becoming one of them. I love how lightweight and cooling it feels on my skin. I also love how it leaves my skin feeling hydrated and plump. Oh, did I mention it's the perfect skin prep for makeup? Kiehl's Ultra Facial Cream Currently 34% off the original full price Another moisturizer I love, this one is slightly thicker and richer than the aforementioned Tatcha product. I like to use this one at night to seal in my serum and coat my skin in soothing moisture. It's been my go-to for over a decade. Embryolisse Lait-Crème Concentré Currently 30% off the original full price Another classic French pharmacy pick, this 3-in-1 formula works as a moisturizer, mask, and makeup primer. It's the epitome of French effortlessness. Anastasia Beverly Hills Brow Wiz Currently 30% off the original full price Everyone's favorite brow pencil, ABH's Brow Wiz creates the most precise, natural-looking strokes. Plus, the shades are on point. It's also long-wearing and smudge-proof. Starface World Hydro-Stars Hydrocolloid Pimple Patches Currently 39% off the original full price These pimple patches are so cute, I have no shame wearing them in public. The little star-shaped hydrocolloid patches absorb the gunk out of pores, shrink swelling, and reduce redness. To put it simply, they work magic to minimize breakouts. Coco & Eve Self Tanner Mousse Kit Currently 30% off the original full price I love Coco & Eve's Self Tanner. It's a 100% natural DHA formula, and it gives my skin a natural-looking, sun-kissed glow with no orange tones or streaks. I'm stocking up on this before winter, so I don't have to wait until summer to get my glow back. GOODAL Green Tangerine Vitamin C Serum Currently 30% off the original full price This is Korea's best-selling vitamin C serum. It uses a powerful blend of 70% fresh green tangerine extract, 4% niacinamide, and arbutin to brighten the skin and banish dark spots. Fable & Mane Holiroots Hair Oil Currently 25% off the original full price I've been vocal about my love for this hair and scalp oil. It uses Dashmool (an Ayurvedic blend of medicinal herbs), ashwagandha, and castor oil to soothe the scalp, boost circulation, and thicken the appearance of the hair. I keep a bottle of this oil on my vanity at all times, so I'm certainly stocking up while it's on sale. Bioderma Atoderm Cleansing Oil Currently 24% off the original full price If you have dry skin, you have to try this shower oil. Yes, it thoroughly cleanses the skin, but beyond that, it makes it feel petal-soft and silky smooth. While other body washes and shower gels tend to dry out the skin, this one boosts hydration and strengthens the moisture barrier. It's my winter body care hero. Kaitlyn McLintock is an Associate Beauty Editor at Who What Wear. Although she covers a wide range of topics across a variety of categories, she specializes in celebrity interviews and skincare and wellness content. Having lived in Los Angeles and Austin, Texas, she recently relocated back to her home state of Michigan where she works remotely. Prior to Who What Wear, she freelanced for a variety of industry-leading digital publications, including InStyle, The Zoe Report, Bustle, Hello Giggles, and Coveteur. Before that, she held a long-term internship and subsequent contributor position at Byrdie. When she's not writing, researching, or testing the latest and greatest beauty products, she's working her way through an ever-growing book collection, swimming in the Great Lakes, or spending time with family.
html:
Black Friday and Cyber Monday are right around the corner, and the holidays are following close behind. That's right, folks—we're sitting squarely in peak shopping season. While there are so many good beauty sales to shop, I don't like getting lost in the hype, buying items I don't need, and spending money I shouldn't have...just because everything is discounted. After all, there's nothing worse than taking a chance on a sale product only to discover that you've wasted your time and money on a subpar product.

That's why, this year, I'm focusing my efforts on purchasing tried-and-true beauty products. I'm talking about the ones that are so good, I buy them all year long at full price. In other words, I'm not buying them because they're on sale, but because I really, truly, honestly love them...and they just so happen to be on sale. Catch my drift? Ahead, see the 19 me-approved, currently-on-sale Amazon beauty items I'm buying for Black Friday.

COSRX

Snail Mucin 96% Power Face Serum

Currently 48% off the original full price

ICYMI, snail mucin is a stellar K-beauty ingredient. It contains high amounts of hyaluronic acid and has anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties. That explains why it's so good at giving me plump, dewy, "glass skin."

This TikTok-famous product doesn't disappoint. With 96% snail mucin, it's chock full of the skin-transforming ingredient. I'm restocking while it's on sale, because I use this all the time, especially in the colder months to soothe, and hydrate my skin.

Shark

Flexstyle Air Styling & Drying System

Currently 23% off the original full price

I've seen the Shark Flexstyle Air Styling & Drying System all over Instagram and TikTok, and for good reason. It dries and styles the hair without excessive heat and subsequent damage. Plus, thanks to powerful airflow, it delivers the big, bouncy blowouts of my dreams. While I already have one, I'm planning on snagging a couple of them while they're on sale to gift to family and friends.

BIODANCE

Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask

Currently 32% off the original full price

Another TikTok-viral product, this overnight hydrogel mask gives me the glowiest, glassiest skin I've ever had. It's all thanks to oligo-hyaluronic acid, ultra-low molecular collagen, galactomyces ferment filtrate, and niacinamide. These ingredients penetrate the skin overnight to moisturize, plump, refine, smooth, and blur the skin. Try it, just once, and tell me you're not in love!

Lancôme

Lash Idôle Lash-Lifting & Volumizing Mascara

SolaWave

4-In-1 Radiant Renewal Facial Wand

Currently 40% off the original full price

This travel-friendly skin device uses four technologies—red light, galvanic current, facial massage, and therapeutic warmth—to target everything from fine lines and wrinkles to dark spots and blemishes. It even comes with the brand's Activating Serum which enhances the results of the device and provides a smooth, cushiony glide.

Youth To The People

Kale and Green Tea Cleanser

Currently 20% off the original full price

I've been using this cleanser on and off for years. It dissolves dirt, oil, makeup, and sunscreen like a charm. It also smells nice, foams into a silky lather, and delivers superfoods straight to my skin (kale, green tea, and spinach). It's like green juice for the face.

Nuxe

Huile Prodigieuse Multi-Purpose Dry Oil

Currently 33% off the original full price

This classic French pharmacy product is so good. The multi-purpose dry oil is never heavy or greasy, and it can be used on the face, body, and hair for extra moisture and nourishment. Plus, it smells incredible. When I wear it, I go without perfume—that's how good it is. While I usually wait to pick this up until I'm in Paris, I have to snag a couple of bottles while it's on sale.

Currently 45% off the original full price

An ice roller is a quick, easy, and affordable way to reduce puffiness and inflammation in the mornings. Plus, if you're a night owl like me, it helps wake you up and feel refreshed, even before your first cup of coffee. I highly recommend trying one if you haven't already.

Currently 20% off the original full price

I know so many die-hard fans of this moisturizer, and I think I'm becoming one of them. I love how lightweight and cooling it feels on my skin. I also love how it leaves my skin feeling hydrated and plump. Oh, did I mention it's the perfect skin prep for makeup?

Kiehl's

Ultra Facial Cream

Currently 34% off the original full price

Another moisturizer I love, this one is slightly thicker and richer than the aforementioned Tatcha product. I like to use this one at night to seal in my serum and coat my skin in soothing moisture. It's been my go-to for over a decade.

Embryolisse

Lait-Crème Concentré

Currently 30% off the original full price

Another classic French pharmacy pick, this 3-in-1 formula works as a moisturizer, mask, and makeup primer. It's the epitome of French effortlessness.

Anastasia Beverly Hills

Brow Wiz

Currently 30% off the original full price

Everyone's favorite brow pencil, ABH's Brow Wiz creates the most precise, natural-looking strokes. Plus, the shades are on point. It's also long-wearing and smudge-proof.

Starface World

Hydro-Stars Hydrocolloid Pimple Patches

Currently 39% off the original full price

These pimple patches are so cute, I have no shame wearing them in public. The little star-shaped hydrocolloid patches absorb the gunk out of pores, shrink swelling, and reduce redness. To put it simply, they work magic to minimize breakouts.

Coco & Eve

Self Tanner Mousse Kit

Currently 30% off the original full price

I love Coco & Eve's Self Tanner. It's a 100% natural DHA formula, and it gives my skin a natural-looking, sun-kissed glow with no orange tones or streaks. I'm stocking up on this before winter, so I don't have to wait until summer to get my glow back.

GOODAL

Green Tangerine Vitamin C Serum

Currently 30% off the original full price

This is Korea's best-selling vitamin C serum. It uses a powerful blend of 70% fresh green tangerine extract, 4% niacinamide, and arbutin to brighten the skin and banish dark spots.

Fable & Mane

Holiroots Hair Oil

Currently 25% off the original full price

I've been vocal about my love for this hair and scalp oil. It uses Dashmool (an Ayurvedic blend of medicinal herbs), ashwagandha, and castor oil to soothe the scalp, boost circulation, and thicken the appearance of the hair. I keep a bottle of this oil on my vanity at all times, so I'm certainly stocking up while it's on sale.

Bioderma

Atoderm Cleansing Oil

Currently 24% off the original full price

If you have dry skin, you have to try this shower oil. Yes, it thoroughly cleanses the skin, but beyond that, it makes it feel petal-soft and silky smooth. While other body washes and shower gels tend to dry out the skin, this one boosts hydration and strengthens the moisture barrier. It's my winter body care hero.

Kaitlyn McLintock is an Associate Beauty Editor at Who What Wear. Although she covers a wide range of topics across a variety of categories, she specializes in celebrity interviews and skincare and wellness content. Having lived in Los Angeles and Austin, Texas, she recently relocated back to her home state of Michigan where she works remotely. Prior to Who What Wear, she freelanced for a variety of industry-leading digital publications, including InStyle, The Zoe Report, Bustle, Hello Giggles, and Coveteur. Before that, she held a long-term internship and subsequent contributor position at Byrdie. When she's not writing, researching, or testing the latest and greatest beauty products, she's working her way through an ever-growing book collection, swimming in the Great Lakes, or spending time with family.
